title: Rock Creek Park: Rules
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Carter Barron Amphitheatre     Rules                Carter Barron Rules      RulesYou are welcome to bring snacks and non-alcoholic beverages into the Amphitheatre as long as they are in paper or plastic and do not violate the restrictions listed below.The following are not permitted within the Amphitheatre gates:alcoholic beveragesaluminum canscoolers – hard sided or frame, picnic basketsglass containersfolding chairs (and non-folding)petsphotography or recording devicessporting equipment – bicycles, roller blades, scooters, balls and batsweapons including firearmsIf you bring an umbrella it must be collapsible and personal size.Please note that all bags will be inspected at the gate.Updated February 2010.
